content: maine woven baby blanket by antonia shankland yarn swan s island worsted weight 250 yds 2 skeins color a 2 skeins color b needles 32 circular #8 gauge 4 ½ stitches is one inch in pattern stitch finished size 32 x 32 pattern stitches row 1 with color a knit row 2 with color a purl row 3 with color b - k1 *slip 1 wyif k1* end k1 row 4 - with color b purl row 5 with color a - k2 *slip 1 wyif k1* end k1 row 6 with color a purl row 7 with color a knit row 8 with color a purl row 9 with color b - k1 * slip 1 wyif k1 row 10 with color b purl row 11 & 12 with color b repeat row 1 and 2 row 13 & 14 with color a repeat row 3 and 4 row 15 & 16 with color b repeat row 5 and 6 row 17 & 18 with color b repeat row 7 and 8 row 19 & 20 with color a repeat row 9 and 10 directions with color a cast on 149 stitches work 10 row in garter stitch as follows alternating 2 row color a 2 row color b note do not cut the yarn when you have to change color drag it up the side of the work start pattern stitch knit first 5 and last 5 stitches which will make a garter stitch border along the side place marker after the first 5 and before the last 5 stitches work pattern stitch in between the markers see pattern stitch continue in pattern until blanket measures 32 work the top of the blanket as for the bottom in 10 row of garter stitch alternating colors a and b every two row bind off gently steam blanket oranje house 2010
